successes.title: OBDLink MX WiFi: A Wireless Gateway to Vehicle OBD Networks
successes.description: Turn your smart phone, tablet, or PC into a sophisticated diagnostic scan tool, trip computer, and real-time performance monitor.

Pledges.description: FRIENDS: Pledge $5 to show your support, and receive project updates, exclusive offers, and features. Like us on Facebook, post the link on Twitter or Google+. Every little bit helps, and we really appreciate your support!
SUPER EARLY ADOPTERS: Be one of the 100 lucky people to get the OBDLink MX WiFi for $70 below retail. FREE USA SHIPPING!
EARLY ADOPTERS: Save $60 off the retail price of $120, and get FREE USA SHIPPING!
EXTENDED EARLY ADOPTERS: Save $50 off the retail price of $120, and get FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!
GOAL SMASHERS: Miss out on the early bird pricing? Here's a chance to save $40 off retail, and get FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!
GOAL SMASHERS #2: Missed out on the early bird pricing? Here's a chance to save $40 off retail, and get FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!
GOAL SMASHERS #3: Let's keep this project humming! Here's another chance to save $40 off retail, and get FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE. Tell a friend!
GOAL SMASHERS #4: You can still be one of the first to own OBDLink MX WiFi, and save $40 off the retail price. FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE! Spread the word and help unlock the first stretch goal!
GOAL SMASHERS #5: Get one OBDLink MX WiFi adapter! You'll save $40 off the retail price by pledging today. Plus, FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE! Thanks for your support!
GOAL SMASHERS #6: Get one OBDLink MX WiFi adapter! You'll save $40 off the retail price by pledging today. Plus, FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!
SPECIAL EDITION: Receive one "Powered by Kickstarter" Edition OBDLink MX WiFi adapter in your choice of red or black. Save $20 off the retail version. Includes FREE worldwide shipping!
STANDARD: If you missed the early adopter special, you can still get MX WiFi at the regular price.
DEVELOPER SPECIAL: Get OBDLink MX WiFi with the ECUsim 2000 Ultimate. The OBD simulator retails for $1600, and is an incredible time saver. Develop at your desk, instead of under your dash!
DEVELOPER SPECIAL #2: Get OBDLink MX WiFi with the fully unlocked ECUsim 2000 Ultimate ($1720 value).
